DESCRIPTION: Takes #b10% more damage for each stack of Hunted on them. When applied, all other hunted enemies are no longer hunted, and other enemies take #b10% less damage for each stack. Reduces by #b1 each turn。
Takes #b10% less damage from attacks for each stack. Reduces by #b1 each turn. When the hunted enemy dies, remove this。
At the end of the turn that no enemy intends to attack you, 获得 #b2 力量 。
At the end of the turn, 获得 格挡 。 When taking un格挡ed attack damage, remove this。
Non-lethal damage will leave targets at 1 生命。
